text:
="preserve">Léo de Almeida Neves (22 March 1932 – 2 November 2020) was a Brazilian politician, economist and lawyer. He was a member of the Chamber of Deputies from 1967 to 1969 and again from 1983 to 1987. He was born in Ponta Grossa, Brazil.
De Almeida Neves died on 2 November 2020 at a São Paulo hospital from bowel obstruction, aged 88.
